message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even above its market price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true worth. To make this work, I can come down to $13,000. This is a very competitive offer considering the value this product brings.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still feel that $13,000 is slightly too high for me. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,500. I hope this aligns better with the value you're providing.
